fields.label: Search
fields.tooltip: Full-text search query expression. Use '*' or omit to match all documents.

fields.label: Query Type
fields.tooltip: Syntax of the search query.

fields.label: Search Mode
fields.tooltip: Whether any or all of the search terms must be matched.

fields.label: Search Fields
fields.tooltip: Comma-separated list of field names to which to scope the full-text search.

fields.label: Select
fields.tooltip: Comma-separated list of fields to retrieve.

fields.label: Filter
fields.tooltip: OData $filter expression to apply to the search query.

fields.label: Order By
fields.tooltip: Comma-separated list of OData $orderby expressions.

fields.label: Facets
fields.tooltip: Facet expressions to apply to the search query.

fields.label: Scoring Profile
fields.tooltip: Name of a scoring profile to evaluate match scores for sorting results.

fields.label: Scoring Parameters
fields.tooltip: Parameter values used in scoring functions, format name-values (example: referencePoint--122.2,44.8).

fields.label: Scoring Statistics
fields.tooltip: Whether to calculate scoring statistics globally (more consistent) or locally (lower latency).

fields.label: Count
fields.tooltip: Whether to fetch the total count of results (approximate; may impact performance).

fields.label: Skip
fields.tooltip: Number of search results to skip (max 100,000).

fields.label: Top
fields.tooltip: Number of search results to retrieve.

fields.label: Minimum Coverage
fields.tooltip: Percentage of the index that must be covered for the query to be reported as a success.

fields.label: Highlight Fields
fields.tooltip: Comma-separated list of field names to use for hit highlights (searchable fields only).

fields.label: Highlight Pre Tag
fields.tooltip: String tag prepended to hit highlights. Must be set with Highlight Post Tag.

fields.label: Highlight Post Tag
fields.tooltip: String tag appended to hit highlights. Must be set with Highlight Pre Tag.

fields.label: Answers
fields.tooltip: Whether answers should be returned as part of the search response.

fields.label: Captions
fields.tooltip: Whether captions should be returned as part of the search response.

fields.label: Debug
fields.tooltip: Enable debugging information for exploring results. Multiple modes can be enabled by separating them with a '|' character (example: semantic|queryRewrites).

fields.label: Hybrid Search
fields.tooltip: The query parameters to configure hybrid search behaviors.

fields.label: Query Language
fields.tooltip: The language of the query.

fields.label: Query Rewrites
fields.tooltip: Only valid for semantic queries. When set to generative, you can append pipe options like generative|count-3.

fields.label: Semantic Configuration
fields.tooltip: Name of a semantic configuration used when processing semantic queries.

fields.label: Semantic Query
fields.tooltip: Separate query used only for semantic reranking/captions/answers.

fields.label: Semantic Error Handling
fields.tooltip: Whether semantic processing should fail the query or return partial results.

fields.label: Semantic Fields
fields.tooltip: Comma-separated list of field names used for semantic ranking.

fields.label: Semantic Max Wait (ms)
fields.tooltip: Upper bound on semantic enrichment processing time before failing. Minimum: 700.

fields.label: Session Id
fields.tooltip: Sticky-session identifier. Cannot start with '_' character.

fields.label: Speller
fields.tooltip: Spell-correct individual search query terms.

fields.label: Vector Filter Mode
fields.tooltip: Whether filters are applied before or after vector search.

fields.label: Vector Queries
fields.tooltip: Vector and hybrid search query parameters.
